sentences.sContent: Try to dress appropriately for each occasion.
sentences.sContent_eng: Try to dress appropriately for each occasion.
sentences.sCn: 试图为每个场合适当地打扮。

sentences.sContent: Do we have any means to align our research appropriately with our understanding of those risks?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do we have any means to align our research appropriately with our understanding of those risks?
sentences.sCn: 我们是否有可能根据对这些风险的理解来适当地调整我们的研究方向呢？
